name: THEY ARE TRAPPED
description:
THEY ARE TRAPPED is a two-player computer game. The players become trapped in program, and then they are forced to fight between each other, which is a re-quirement to get out of virtual reality.

However, this never happens, because when the game is over, everything goes back to the beginning, and so on. The title can be described as a side platform shooter, maintained in the pixel art style

ATTENTION: You need to at least one controller to play
